name: Lumberjack
ability: Each night*, choose someone: they do not wake tonight.

name: Faceswapper
ability: You might register as the Demon and the Demon may might as a Minion.

name: Disguiser
ability: Each night, choose a player: you will register as them and they will register as you to any Good abilities until dawn. If your chosen person dies at night, you are poisoned until dawn. Otherwise, you are sober.
flavor: The lost art of disguise; give me 10 minutes. I can fix your looks.

name: Antisexual
ability: If Good players talk about sex or are horny, something bad may happen. You learn what happens to who.

name: Duolaty
ability: You start knowing the players that have the character you doubled. Once per game, at night, choose a learned player: they are poisoned. [A character is doubled]

name: Poltergeist
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they become an evil Minion (unless this would make too many). [You are the only Minion]

name: Swashbuckler
ability: You start knowing one Minion and their character. For each dead Minion, at night*, choose a player: they die. One player registers as a Minion to your ability.

name: Thug
ability: You start knowing the number of in-play Outsiders. When an Outsider dies, choose a player: they are poisoned. [+1 or -1 Outsider]

name: Mole
ability: You have a not-in-play Townsfolk ability. You might register as Good, a Townsfolk or an Outsider, even if dead.

name: Mercenary
ability: Every even night, choose a player and guess their character: if you guess correctly, they are poisoned.

name: Poacher
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die and you gain their ability.

name: Joker
ability: You do not know your ability. Once per game, during the day, publicly guess your ability: if you are correct, your team wins. One good player knows you are in-play.

name: Werewolf
ability: Once per game, at night, choose to have all Townsfolk abilities yield false info until dusk. While dead, one player receives false info.

name: Agent
ability: Each night, you learn part of the Grimoire. Your living neighbors might register falsely to Good abilities.
flavor: Let me collect the information. Put the pieces together.

name: Godfather [OMR]
ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in-play. If 1 is executed, a player dies at midnight. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

name: Devil's Advocate [OMR]
ability: Each night, choose a player (not the same as last night): if executed tomorrow, a different player dies instead at midnight.

name: Assassin [OMR]
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they are poisoned & die.

name: Mastermind [OMR]
ability: If the Demon dies by execution, play for one more day. If a good player is executed, evil wins.

name: Agitprop
ability: Each night, choose a player and a statement: that player is “mad” that statement is true tomorrow, or might be executed.

name: Brainwasher
ability: Townsfolk might receive the incorrect character in setup (their abilities work normally).

name: Templar
ability: If an Evil player nominates and executes a Good player they did not whisper today, Evil wins. Each day, if no-one dies, Evil wins.

name: Chairman
ability: You know which players are Outsiders. Once per game at night*, call Minions to a meeting. By majority vote, you may swap the Demon with a Good Outsider. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

name: LIZARD (M)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Crispers
ability: Your setup modification is one that is in-play. You learn what it is. [?]

name: Fire Whirl
ability: Each night, choose three Good characters (different from last): if any are in-play, you learn which, who is which, and may choose one: you gain the ability and may register as this character and good until dusk. [+1 Outsider]

name: Patron
ability: Each night, you may choose a character: anything anyone was mad about involving this character until dusk may become true. If you chose a character the previous night, a Good player learns this.

name: Censor
ability: Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each night, you learn true information that would have been received by any in-play Townsfolk.

name: Vigilante
ability: Each night, choose a player: the first player (not the Demon) who votes for them tomorrow dies.
